title: Amy’s Husband On How Someone Could Steal A Plane + Caller Wants to Move for A Girl He Just Met Online + Our Favorite Moments of 2019 List (#10-6)
itunes:title: Amy’s Husband On How Someone Could Steal A Plane + Caller Wants to Move for A Girl He Just Met Online + Our Favorite Moments of 2019 List (#10-6)
description:
We saw in the news that someone stole an airplane in town…so Bobby sent Amy to interview her husband, who is a pilot, on how someone could pull it off. He sounded very annoyed! Bobby helps a caller with dating advice about wanting to move for a girl he met on a dating app. We share the first half of our list of our Favorite Show Moments of 2019.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
